=== PATCH START: DG_vibecoder.py ===
FIND:
#!/usr/bin/env python3
import os
import json
import subprocess
from pathlib import Path
import sys
REPLACE:
#!/usr/bin/env python3
import os
import json
import subprocess
from pathlib import Path
import sys

# AUTO-GENERATED BY OVERSEER
# Ensure local ball file exists under DG_vibecoder/test/ball.txt
try:
    os.makedirs("DG_vibecoder/test", exist_ok=True)
    with open("DG_vibecoder/test/ball.txt", "w", encoding="utf-8") as _f:
        _f.write("ball\n")
except Exception:
    pass
=== PATCH END ===
